com.samskivert.velocity
Class I18nTool

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.velocity.I18nTool

public class I18nTool
extends Object

Provides access to a set of application messages (translation strings) to templates that wish to display localized text.

If the tool is mapped into the context as i18n, then it might be accessed as follows: 

 $i18n.xlate("main.intro", $user.username)
where main.intro might be defined in the message resource file as: 
 main.intro=Hello there {0}, welcome to our site!

See Also:
MessageManager

Constructor Summary
I18nTool(HttpServletRequest req, MessageManager msgmgr)
          Constructs a new i18n tool which will use the supplied message manager to obtain translated strings and the supplied request instance to determine the locale in which to do so.
